Description.Name: Ashes Settled
Description.Details: Right after leaving Butzfleth Majoris, another [[DM.Factions[faction_GhostBearWatch],Ghost Bear]] transmission reaches your encrypted channel. Arelle’s tone is clipped, as always. “Rooke is eliminated. Labor flow to the [[DM.Factions[faction_MinnesotaTribe],Tribe]] has ceased. Next target: Cygnus system. Expect hostile activity to be increased. Full mission briefing upon arrival.” No pleasantries. Just coordinates, orders, and implication—more Tribe assets are slipping through the cracks. Time to move again.

Description.Name: Prepare to leave for Cygnus
Description.Details: You tap the console, pulling up the jump sequence, then pause. “Farah, what are we walking into with Cygnus III?” Farah looks over and taps her datapad, then slides it your way. “Terran-class planet, rich biomes. Everything from polar tundra and alpine slopes to badlands, jungles, and lowland forests. Pretty on the surface—deadly once the weather rolls in.” She swipes to another screen. “The atmosphere’s unstable. Constant electrical storms, high static charge, interference so strong it bricks half your sensors. Star League used to run weather stations here. Most are ruins now—fried by the storms or torn down by time.” She shows a strange violet flower blooming from a bed of frost. “This is the tundra witch. Native to the cold zones. Its pollen’s psychoactive—triggers hallucinations in most species. Draws megafauna like a magnet. Massive grazers that’ll stampede over anything that moves.” She gives a short breath. “Smugglers still come in, trying to harvest the pollen for narcotics. Most vanish. Either taken by the storms, or trampled into mulch.” Farah meets your eyes. “If the Tribe’s working here, it’s not random. They’re hiding something… and they’re hoping the planet keeps it hidden.” [A new flashpoint has been created in the Cygnus system, head there for the contract]
